entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:50 PM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
